metadata.name: 2520 (BEATS PROLOGUE)
metadata.description:
2520 is the smallest number divisible by all integers (whole numbers) from 1 to 10, i.e. it is their least common multiple.
This piece is divided into 10 rectangular parts. Each rectangle represents a number between 1 and 10, using it as frame count as a black or white frame. 2520 frames create a perfect loop.

2160 x 2160
25fps
H.264
2520 frames, or 00:01:40:20
Michael Hughes, 2021
